# Theme › Component › Logo

- **options** | _array_
  - **display_comp** | _boolean_
  - **display_text** | _boolean_
- **classes** | _array_
  - **comp** | _string_
  - **path_mark** | _string_ : 'text-{color}' (required)
  - **path_text** | _string_ : 'text-{color}' (required)
